======Changes skins on beta parasite.======

= Description =

Enables the possibility of having skins on a beta parasite. It simply add the possibility of randomly having them. This cvar was added to change the beta parasite skin while [[asw_parasite_beta_skin.wiki|asw_beta_parasite_skin]] was enabled.

==== Example ====

Beta parasite default skin
<img align=center src=beta_parasite_skin0.png /></a>

Beta parasite new skin
<img align=center src=beta_parasite_skin1.png /></a>
